layer.name: Discipline
layer.definition: Consistently making yourself do what needs to be done, especially when you don't feel like doing it.

questions.text: I feel the full range of emotions throughout the day without those emotions dictating my actions.
questions.principle: Feel the rollercoaster, don't act on the rollercoaster

questions.text: I process difficult emotions (journaling, talking, praying) rather than burying or numbing them.
I pause before responding when emotionally triggered rather than reacting impulsively.
I have healthy outlets for stress and negative emotions rather than destructive coping mechanisms.
I address emotional issues in relationships directly rather than letting resentment build or avoiding conflict.
